segments.text: I see the kitchen bathed in warm daylight, a comforting scene of domesticity.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman, with her knee-length dress and apron, is so focused on drying that she seems oblivious to the chaos around her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can’t help but notice the water pouring over the edge of the sink, forming a growing puddle on the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It’s almost surreal how she is completely unaware of this small disaster unfolding at her feet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy on the unstable stool stretches toward the cookie jar, his determination evident in his posture.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel a pang of anxiety watching him; he could fall at any moment, and it’s making my heart race.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl nearby is practically vibrating with anticipation, her hand raised eagerly, waiting for her share.
segments.speaker: PAR
